name: fetchallassociationsbelongingtoamatch
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleardil.
Tool description: The End-to-End KYC compliance solution An integrated platform to effortlessly meet all your Anti-Money Laundering and KYC requirements - on the back of a modern Web Portal and a developer-friendly API.
API description: Fetch all associations belonging to a specific match for a given customer and screening ID.

authorization.description: The authorization token for accessing the API.

content_type.description: The MIME type of the request.
